inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic Stage D heart failure requiring initiation of inotropic medication at the discretion of their cardiologist
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients incapable of signing informed consent for any reason
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are pregnant or breastfeeding
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Systolic blood pressure less than 85 mmHg prior to randomization
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Documented allergy or adverse reaction to milrinone
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
